thread.title: TalkTalk customers warned after cyber attack puts bank and personal details a... - Daily Echo
thread.title_full: TalkTalk customers warned after cyber attack puts bank and personal details a... - Daily Echo - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Daily Echo
title: TalkTalk customers warned after cyber attack puts bank and personal details a... - Daily Echo
text:
Millions of people could have had their credit card and bank details stolen after a ''significant and sustained cyber attack'' on TalkTalk's website. Scotland Yard's cyber crime unit is investigating after the telecoms giant said customers' names, dates of birth, addresses and phone numbers may also have been accessed.
 Daily Echo.
